page.title: 06EDINBAME - TOURISM
page.content: When visitors come to us for bed and breakfast, they ask where they can get an evening meal and we send them to one of the Edinbane Hotels or to the restaurant in Kildonan. There is another hotel in Greshornish, across the bay. This is a good centre for tourists; older people enjoy walking and photographing the scenery and fot teenagers there is a sports centre with badminton, pool and table-tennis. On a summer evening the sunsets are beautiful with the red still showing in the sky at midnight. In clear weather it is never really dark in mid-simmer. In the evenings there is a variety of entertainment in the hotels; ceilidh, mucis and dancing while there is disco dancing in the sports centre. The scent of peat fires is also popular with tourists. Some tourists enjoy water sports.
